ai-patthana7.1:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in MN 4.)
ai-patthana7.1:1.1_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
ai-patthana7.1:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the unskillful.
ai-patthana7.1:2.1_1: The two aggregates from form, mind, and mental phenomena.
ai-patthana7.1:2.1_2: There is no cause or condition for the unskillful.
ai-patthana7.1:2.1_3: No skilled in the teaching of the unskillful.
ai-patthana7.1:2.1_4: Skillful thoughts, unskillful qualities arise because of unskillful qualities.
ai-patthana7.1:2.1_5: Unskillful thoughts, unskillful qualities arise because of the unskillful ...
ai-patthana7.1:3.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the unskillful.
ai-patthana7.1:3.1_1: There is no cause or condition for the unskillful.
ai-patthana7.1:3.1_2: Not knowing the unskillful is a cause of unskillful. Existence is a reason for the sake of painful feeling.
ai-patthana7.1:3.1_3: Nor is a cause or reason.
ai-patthana7.1:3.1_4: Not skilled in the teaching, unskillful qualities don’t arise because of the unskillful.
ai-patthana7.1:4.1_0: Nose rule has been declared by marred.
ai-patthana7.1:4.1_1: There is no cause or condition for the unskillful.
ai-patthana7.1:4.1_2: There is no cause or condition for the unskillful.
ai-patthana7.1:4.1_3: Nor do they arise because of past insanity.
ai-patthana7.1:4.1_4: Nor do they arise because of past insanity.
ai-patthana7.1:4.1_5: Nor do they arise from the four unskillful things and not arise because of past deeds.
ai-patthana7.1:5.1_0: No skilled in doing what is unskillful and what is a cause.
ai-patthana7.1:5.1_1: One who is not skilled in what is unskillful, nor what is a cause.
ai-patthana7.1:5.1_2: Skilled in the unskillful and the principle not for the sake of decoration.
ai-patthana7.1:5.1_3: nor are they causes and conditions for the unskillful.
ai-patthana7.1:5.1_4: nor are they causes and conditions for the unskillful.
ai-patthana7.1:6.1_0: Nose is a cause of unskillful and unskillful phenomena.
ai-patthana7.1:6.1_1: Not skilled in what is unskillful and what is a cause of the unskillful.
ai-patthana7.1:6.1_2: Nose is a cause or condition for the unskillful.
ai-patthana7.1:6.1_3: No matter what is unskillful and skillful, nor what is a cause or condition for the hurtful.
ai-patthana7.1:6.1_4: nor are they causes and conditions for the unskillful ...
ai-patthana7.1:7.1_0: No skilled in the teaching of the unskillful and the causes for the reason.
ai-patthana7.1:7.1_1: No skilled in the teaching and skilled in the teaching.
ai-patthana7.1:7.1_2: nor are they causes and unskillful qualities to be unskillful.
ai-patthana7.1:8.1_0: (The Teaching should not be expanded as in brief.)
ai-patthana7.1:9.1_0: Transmigrating as a result of four bases ...
ai-patthana7.1:10.1_0: (All should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana7.1:11.1_0: ‘This is not the cause or condition for the teachings.’ ...
ai-patthana7.1:11.1_1: skilled in the teaching of the unskillful.
ai-patthana7.1:11.1_2: skilled in the teaching of the unskillful.
ai-patthana7.1:11.1_3: nor is a reason for leaving the teachings.
ai-patthana7.1:11.1_4: skilled in the teaching of the unskillful and what is not the support for the teaching.
ai-patthana7.1:11.1_5: skilled in the teaching of the unskillful and what is not the support for the teaching.
ai-patthana7.1:11.1_6: skilled in the teaching of the unskillful and what is not the reason for this.
ai-patthana7.1:12.1_0: Though the teaching is not skilled in the texts on monastic training, profit for six reasons.
ai-patthana7.1:13.1_0: So that is not the case of the Teaching and the Monastic Law, but the support that the training is six reason for six reasons.
ai-patthana7.1:14.1_0: nor are they skilled in the teachings, skilled in the meaning, and skilled in the teaching.
ai-patthana7.1:15.1_0: nor are they skilled in the teachings, skilled in the meaning, and skilled in the teaching.
ai-patthana7.1:16.1_0: skilled in the teachings and skilled in the teachings.
ai-patthana7.1:17.1_1: I say that there is a cause and reason why.
ai-patthana7.1:17.1_2: ‘What is a cause and condition for the next’ ...
ai-patthana7.1:17.1_3: a cause and condition for rebirth ...
ai-patthana7.1:17.1_4: if they are a cause of each other,
ai-patthana7.1:17.1_6: is a cause and condition for conditions ...
ai-patthana7.1:17.1_7: if he is a reason for at the word;
ai-patthana7.1:17.1_8: not the teaching of the unskillful. ...
ai-patthana7.1:17.1_9: skilled in the teachings and skilled in the teachings.
ai-patthana7.1:18.1_0: One is not skilled in the teachings of the unskillful.
ai-patthana7.1:18.1_1: One is not skilled in the teachings of the teachings,
ai-patthana7.1:18.1_2: nor is the teaching for the unskillful.
ai-patthana7.1:19.1_0: nor is a cause and unskillful in the teachings.
ai-patthana7.1:19.1_1: They’re not skilled in the teachings, skilled in the meaning, and skilled in the teaching.
ai-patthana7.1:19.1_2: skilled in the teachings and skilled in the teachings.
ai-patthana7.1:20.1_0: Though there are twenty-five sets of three for six months, four for five reasons, six, eighteen, thirty-six, or a hundred and eight parts. In order to purify each other, to put them in charge, to live together with year, and to get past each other. There are two, three, four, four, or five hundred, ten, twenty, or twenty-four items.
ai-patthana7.1:21.1_0: (This should be expanded as in the same way.)
